title: The First Whisper
riddle: I shine, yet I borrow my light. I wax, I wane, I watch the night. Tell me my name, and the story shall wake.
story: The moon hung low over the frostbitten forest, her light spilling over branches dusted with silver. In the silence, a whisper stirred — your journey has begun. Somewhere in the cold, a secret awaits.

title: Echo Beneath the Stars
riddle: I am heard but never seen, my voice a shimmer between worlds. What am I?
story: Somewhere between the stars, an echo answered the moon’s call. Faint, but real — proof that she was not alone.
